page.title: 07GLENMACHAN TOWER HOTEL
page.content: THE HOTEL IS A LISTED BUILDING SITUATED IN 9 ACRES OF WOODLAND.IT HAS RECENTLY BEEN PURCHASED BY A LOCAL CHURCH,WITH A VIEW TO USING THE HOTEL FOR RECEPTIONS AND FUNCTIONS CONDUCTED IN A CHRISTIAN ATMOSPHERE,AT A REASONABLE PRICE. THE 'STABLES' , A FUNCTIONS BUILDING ON SITE,WILL BE CONVERTED TO A YOUTH COMPLEX TO HOUSE THE 'TEENS AND TWENTIES' CLUB IN THE EVENINGS AND THE PRESCHOOL PLAYGROUP EACH WEEKDAY. FUTURE PLANS INCLUDE A NEW CHURCH HALL COMPLEX FOR THE SUNDAY SCHOOL AND OTHER ORGANISATIONS,AS WELL AS A LARGE SANCTUARY TO SEAT TWO THOUSAND PEOPLE.
